 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְחֵנָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==concubine== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְחֵינְתָא‎</span>; [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>Levy NHWB ii. 534 f.</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, indelicate epithet for woman; Batten<sup>[[Ezra.2.65|Ezra 2:65]]</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***note, tune, song***; still otherwise [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>De, HL u. Koh. 454</sup>); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְחֵנָתָךְ‎</span> [[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵּ֯‎</span> v[[Dan.5.2|Dan 5:2]] v[[Dan.5.3|Dan 5:3]].
